io.spine.server.rejection

Class DispatcherRejectionDelivery

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.delivery.Delivery<E,C>
      • io.spine.server.delivery.MulticastDelivery<io.spine.core.RejectionEnvelope,io.spine.core.RejectionClass,RejectionDispatcher<?>>
        • io.spine.server.rejection.DispatcherRejectionDelivery

  • @SPI
public abstract class DispatcherRejectionDelivery
extends MulticastDelivery<io.spine.core.RejectionEnvelope,io.spine.core.RejectionClass,RejectionDispatcher<?>>
    A base class for the strategies on delivering the rejections from the rejection bus to the corresponding rejection dispatchers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected DispatcherRejectionDelivery()
      Creates an instance of rejection delivery with a direct executor used for the business rejection dispatching.
      protected DispatcherRejectionDelivery(java.util.concurrent.Executor delegate)
      Create a dispatcher rejection delivery with an Executor used for the operation.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeliveryAction

        protected java.lang.Runnable getDeliveryAction(RejectionDispatcher<?> consumer,
                                               io.spine.core.RejectionEnvelope deliverable)
        Description copied from class: Delivery
        Defines what should be done to deliver a given deliverable to the targetConsumer.

        Each Delivery implementation defines this behaviour depending on the type of the consumer.

        The result is defined as Runnable, as this action will be executed by a delegate Executor, according to the strategy implementation regulated by shouldPostponeDelivery() and deliverNow() methods.

        Specified by:
        getDeliveryAction in class Delivery<io.spine.core.RejectionEnvelope,RejectionDispatcher<?>>
        Parameters:
        consumer - the consumer to deliver the item to
        deliverable - the item to be delivered
        Returns:
        the action on how to deliver the given item to the consumer.

      • directDelivery

        public static DispatcherRejectionDelivery directDelivery()
        Obtains a pre-defined instance of the DispatcherRejectionDelivery, which does not postpone any rejection dispatching and uses direct executor for operation.
        Returns:
        the pre-configured direct delivery
